description:
This adjustable mount keeps your phone right in front of you. Access the GPS, soundtrack the ride, and answer you crucial calls (once you're stopped and safely pulled over, of course).

  • Side grips secure your device
  • Rotates 360° for portrait or landscape viewing
  • Accommodates phones up to 90mm wide
  • Requires the Thule Pack'n'Pedal handlebar mount
name: Thule Smartphone Bike Mount
